title: Watercress and crab salad
ingredients: ['150g bag watercress, roughly chopped', '175g tinned crabmeat', '1 stick celery, chopped', '2 spring onions, chopped', '1 tomato, chopped', '4 tbsp olive oil', '4 tbsp rice vinegar', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh basil', '1 pinch salt and pepper to taste']
